#include<iostream>
using namespace std;
int main(){
    char a[101]={0};
    int b,s;
    cin>>b;
    while(b--){
        s=0;
        cin>>a;
        for(int i=0;a[i]!=0&&i<=100;i++){
            if(a[i]=='A'||a[i]=='D'||a[i]=='O'||a[i]=='P'||a[i]=='Q'||a[i]=='R')
                s++;
            else if(a[i]=='B')
                s+=2;
           

        }
         cout<<s<<endl;

    }

}
